merlot: Merlot is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

chardonnay: Chardonnay is a dry white wine which is bold and full bodied.

malbec: Malbec is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

riesling: Riesling is a white wine which is crisp and light bodied.

cabernet sauvignon: Cabernet Sauvignon is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

pinot noir: Pinot Noir is a dry red wine which is light and fruity.

sauvignon blanc: Sauvignon Blanc is a dry white wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

syrah: Shiraz is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

zinfandel: Zinfandel is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.

tempranillo: Tempranillo is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.

grenache: Grenache is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
